3.title: Sensational Scams
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: 104 Hidden Contraband
4.plot: Criminals always have to hide their illicit goods, but these devious crooks take it to the next level. From ruthless drug traffickers like Pablo Escobar and Frank Lucas to a New York slick scam artist, these cold-blooded masterminds have one thing in common: they make all traces of their crimes disappear.

6.title: Crime by Design
6.plot: These are the most evil architects of crime who designed perfect schemes, outsmarting anyone who dared to get in their way. A mastermind of government corruption, a team of college con artists, a psychopathic serial-killer, and one of the world's most cutting-edge drug lords - each devise elaborate plots to take over the world.

7.title: High-Tech Hijinks
7.plot: Whether it's overcoming the sophisticated multi-layered security of a diamond vault, using the deep web to take drug dealing into the 21st century, training with high tech gear to beat a casino, or most nefarious of all, employing software tricks to spread terrorism around the world - these master criminals are on the cutting edge of technology.

imdb.plot outline: For centuries, brilliant minds have changed and shaped the world. But when genius is used for evil, the results are some of the most twisted, inventive, and outrageous crimes in history. This is a show about how bad things work not things working badly; the inner-workings and process behind all the stuff that's against the law. Think of it as Modern Marvels for black market, smuggling, drugs, gangs, and other crime and vice.
imdb.title: Evil Genius
